revised_title: An Investigation of Light Dispersion by Potassium Vapour
tldr: The author investigates the dispersion of light by potassium vapour and discovers that the deviation due to potassium vapour is observable over the whole visible spectrum and into the ultra-violet region. The phenomenon of anomalous dispersion is observed at the lines of the principal series and nearby wave-lengths, with the dispersion effects being most noticeable outside the lines forming a pair.
